In the 2018 movie 'Black Panther', why did T'Challa, Okoye, and Nakia travel to Busan, South Korea?
Options:
A. To attend a conference
B. To sell an artifact to Everett K. Ross
C. To stop Klaue from selling an artifact to Everett K. Ross
D. To meet Everett K. Ross for a diplomatic mission
Correct Answer: To stop Klaue from selling an artifact to Everett K. Ross
